meanings.definition: Relating to the interaction between mind and body.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the psychophysical connection helps us see how our thoughts affect our physical health.
meanings.sent2: The psychophysical exercises aim to improve both mental clarity and physical strength.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her psychophysical balance was so off that she felt like a walking contradiction.
meanings.sent4: The psychophysical bond between them was so strong, they could almost read each other's thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The psychophysical link between stress and muscle tension is undeniable.

meanings.sent2: His psychophysical well-being improved after he started practicing mindfulness and yoga.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the relationship between psychological and physiological processes.
meanings.sent1: The psychophysical effects of stress can manifest as both mental anxiety and physical symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Research in psychophysical medicine explores the intricate connections between mind and body.
meanings.sent3: She found it fascinating how psychophysical responses could vary based on individual experiences.
